help-file.title: GET TAKE
help-file.content:
Syntax: get <object> | take <object>
If you are in a hurry, or if you feel greedy, you can type get all. You can also use "get" and "take" to extract objects from containers.
Example: "get dagger from bag" or more simply, "get dagger bag".
When there is more than one object of the same name in the container or room and you wish to get a particular one, use the following example as a guideline:
You are in a room and you see:
A shiny box is lying in the dirt here. A shiny box is lying in the dirt here.
If you wished to get the second box, you would type:
"get 2.box"
